name: Cosmetic Formulations course Duration and Schedule

speech: Our Cosmetic Formulations courses are typically 1 month in duration, covering both Basic and Advanced levels. We offer flexible scheduling options, including weekday and weekend classes. Let me know if you’d like specific timing details for a particular course.
